steps.name: Click on the 'E-posta adresiyle devam et' button
Check The Text For 'E-posta adresini gir'
The searched city is selected within the location box
The select box is closed after the selection process is completed
A category is selected and clicked from the list of available categories
A product belonging to the selected category is chosen from under that category
Filter the product's brand is selected
